        sep="\t",
        header=None,
        names=["Metric","Value"]
    )
    raw_asm_t1=raw_asm_stats.iloc[[1, 31, 32]]

<details>
<summary>QV per scaffold</summary>

```{python}
#| output: asis
if assemble:
    qvs = []
    for qv_file in glob.glob(f"{log_path}/*-raw-*_merqury.*.qv"):
        if os.path.getsize(qv_file) > 0:
            qvs.append(
                pd.read_csv(
                    qv_file,
                    sep="\t",
                    header=None,
                    names=[
                        "Scaffold",
                        "No support k-mers",
                        "Total k-mers",
                        "QV",
                        "Error rate",
                    ],
                    dtype={
                        "Scaffold": str,
                        "No support k-mers": int,
                        "Total k-mers": int,
                        "QV": float,
                        "Error rate": float,
                    },
                    na_values=["", "inf"],
                )
            )
    if qvs:
        per_scaffold_qv_raw = pd.concat(qvs, ignore_index=True)
        print(per_scaffold_qv_raw.to_markdown(index=False))
    else:
        print("No per scaffold qv found")
```
